website_summaries.verdict: A large yet easily portable washing machine that packs a lot of cleaning power, though there are concerns about its durability.
pros: Holds about 12 pounds of laundry at a time
Takes 20 minutes to clean and spin dry clothes
Powerful spin cycle that sucks most of the water out of clothes
cons: The drainage hose is a little short
Some users say machine broke after a few months

website_summaries.verdict: Two-in-one machine washes and dries and does its expected job.
pros: We love that this product can wash and dry clothes with no plumbing required and at nearly the same cost as solo machines
Also great for the details such as removing stains
cons: The plastic structure may shake a bit when overextended

website_summaries.verdict: A wash and spin combo that uses very little detergent, but may take a while to fully run a load.
pros: Features both a washer and a spin dryer unit
Washer capacity is eight pounds, while the spin dryer's is 4.4 pounds
Comes with a manual, water fill tube, and a drainage hose
cons: You will need to set it up higher than the drain
Some found that it takes a while to wash clothes with this option, that it doesn't rinse well

customer_reviews.title: Best washer on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Best washing machine EVER! This thing gets my clothes cleaner than the top brand regular washers! It got stains in my daughters dress out that I couldn't get out previously, even with stain remover. The spin cycle is awesome! Clothes come out almost dry! I love the black vs the blue which is why I choose this one! So happy I did! I may never go back to a regular washer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Cleanest wash I’ve ever gotten from a machine of via hand ever! The spin is also super powerful, it sucks out all the water. I use it with a Tide Simply free, which I think is the best for delicates. Read the manual, you need to. Heads up, it is a bit involved. You’ll need to switch the clothes between washer and spinner at least twice. Also it drains by gravity so you’ll need it higher.
customer_reviews.author: sntrada

customer_reviews.title: Washer works great but the spinner does not spin and had it ...
customer_reviews.text: Washer works great but the spinner does not spin and had it only for a few days. When I tried to get a tech to help me neither Amazon or the seller could help me. Worse money I spent on here
customer_reviews.author: Sayonara Costa

customer_reviews.title: This washing machine is amazing! It exceeded my expectations for getting clothes clean
customer_reviews.text: This washing machine is amazing! It exceeded my expectations for getting clothes clean. This machine is perfect for small living spaces. It is true it must be hand filled with water unless you come up with another way to fill the tub as the provided water cords are useless. It wasn't enough to lower my star rating. The machine is small enough to sit on an end table which allows water to easily drain from the machine into the bath tub. It seems it is no longer available how I originally purchased it. I certainly wouldn't pay the $300 plus one third party seller is asking. If it again comes available through Amazon, it is worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ottley

customer_reviews.title: Stained not new
customer_reviews.text: I received this machine on May 27, 2018. After taking it out of the box to set it up I noticed that there were several brown stains and spots on the outside of the machine. At first I thought probably shipping and handling, upon further inspection there were spots and stain on the inside of the machine and on the hoses. Not sure how they ended up there but I paid for a new machine. I am now returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: NahJah

customer_reviews.title: I love this little mini-washer
customer_reviews.text: I love this little mini-washer!!! It's great for hand washables and small loads that I have. It is the perfect size for my 5th wheel, even though I don't have a w/d hookup in mine it's the same width of my galley island so it's perfect. I set the sink cover up on a folding step stool and place the washer on top of that, gives me enough height for draining into a collapsible dish pan, which I also use for filling it up since I can't connect to my faucet. The spinner will get nearly all of the water out of my hand washables and they nearly come out dry in some cases. It was a great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Betsworth

customer_reviews.title: Sad service
customer_reviews.text: My machine stopped working I been trying to contact think awesome and think gizmo and it’s not doing me any good my machine has been not working and I’ve emailed and called and no action what so ever I don’t understand why I paid 139.99 and after 3 months it just stopped working on the washer side the spinner word but not the washer part :( sad.
customer_reviews.author: Ja

customer_reviews.title: but it does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: This machine has exceeded expectations. You can only wash a few articles of clothing at a time, but it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Good, but time consuming
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, only thing I was disappointed with is how long it takes to do 1 load. If this is your only washing machine, just expect to spend about 45 min for 1 load. And you have to constantly add water, drain, move to the spinner, add water, spin again. It feels never ending. So you can’t just set it and walk away. It’s very time consuming, but it does work well and is pretty convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to wash your clothes
customer_reviews.text: This machine takes 2nd place after washing your clothes with your hands.Took me 2hours to wash my baby clothes. Nothing is automatic only wash spin and dry spin. In between you need to pour water and drain it, then repeat couple of times to make sure the soap is gone. Plus I couldn’t even use the hose without spilling the water all over the place.Might as well washed it with my hands
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Hard work, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This little washer is great. I live in an apartment and hate doing laundry I a communal laundry room. This is good enough to get by. It really cleans your clothes. It’s a lot of hard work, because you need to fill and drain yourself. It’s in no way automatic. A load of about 2 pants and, 2 shirts and a 3 underwear usually take me 45 minutes to do. I spin twice just to get the excess out and then I hang to dry. The spinner is fantastic. Really wrings out the clothes well. Overall, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I had to give this Gizmo TG23 Portable washing machine ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to give this Gizmo TG23 Portable washing machine atleast 1 star, otherwise it wouldn't let me submit my review. I would prefer not to give it any stars. It neither agitates or spins dry. I put water in plug it in & it just has a low hum from the motor. That's it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first stopped working after 2 months. Love the concept but I don’t think it’s made for daily use. Maybe good for small towels and baby clothes daily.
customer_reviews.author: angela morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience Easy to Use Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an apartment if you don't want to use the shared facilities or for washing underwear, small towels, shirts, jeans,socks. Definitely get a rubber mat: stability and noise control when spin cycle is on. It's not super loud but RECOMMENDED to get the mat. Easiest way to fill the washtub side is by using a bucket...after draining, fill back up and use the wash cycle again like you're rinsing out the extra soap. Careful not to overload the spinner. But by the time you spin a few items, say 5 minutes, clothes are practically dry!!! Definitely worth the money and free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Works cleverly well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this portable washer for the purpose of easing my weekly laundry task. The goal was to wash many of the smaller items early, rather than waiting until my weekly or bi-weekly laundry day. The portable washer is lite-weight, cleans laundry very good, the spin-drier works surprisingly well and the washer is easy to store. Yesterday was my first time using my portable washer and I am totally happy with everything. Also, let me add that this washer makes very little noise which is important to me and thought that it would be worth-while to mention.
customer_reviews.author: NadiaAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected but still good
customer_reviews.text: I’m not too sure what they mean by stretch but I’m assuming they’re referring to the load size the machine can hold. I used to have a Costway but after 5 years of use it broke drown on me so I bought this one. It does the job but it’s no where near as strong as the other portable washer I had. It also doesn’t hold/wash as much clothes at one time as my other washer. However! It’s still so well worth it. My husband works construction so to be able to wash his stinky clothes every day instead of letting it sit in it’s funk makes it all worthwhile. Just wish it was a bit bigger and stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two ppl. Suitable for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Using it for almost two months, easy to shift clean and move. Definitely recommended if you are hesitant to use community laundry rooms during Covid time. Just remember this is a mini washing machine, so can’t load more (which is obvious). Drying is perfect, suitable for jeans as well (dries completely in a day inside apartment) . You can easily place inside bathtub and use shower pipeline for filling water. Recommend product for dorms, studio and other small place. Update: Spinner stopped worrking after 4 months, seller arranged full rerfund.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Dryer Lid
customer_reviews.text: Product came with Dryer side lid bent and hard to lift up and down. Also the spin dryer puts lent all over my clothes. I am disappointed in this purchase and will be sending this back for my money to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Ambition

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous portable washer/spin dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine! I love it and use it often. The spin dryer works great too. It gets things so dry that a 1/2 hour ( an hour for heavy items) of hanging in the summer air and they are dry and ready to put away. It's saving me a fortune in laundry quarters!
customer_reviews.author: 4DogsInAnRV

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work great the spinner did stop working for a little while ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my portable washer today. It seems to work great the spinner did stop working for a little while and then started working again so hopefully there won't be any further problems so I would give it 4 stars for the spinner stop working and the tubes are flimsy the drain the water and deliver the water into the machine
customer_reviews.author: susan brownfiel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t turn knobs counterclockwise/drain hose fall off
customer_reviews.text: What I liked most: washing my clothes at home and soaking them which I don’t get to do at laundromat. What I like least: unable to safely turn knobs counterclockwise. It warns of this in pamphlet saying it will break the knobs. Say whaaa? So I have to carefully turn clockwise to just the right time.... or wait for it to finish. Second thing I don’t like: after 7 washing’s, the unit now drains from the bottom, not the drain hose. Wow. Now I’ll have to take unit apart and attach hose again. I hope this old woman will be able to do this !
customer_reviews.author: Mornaluz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It's very easy to use and no set up really required. It's not noisy, it's perfect for those small loads like when you get out the shower. The only issues I have it is that the drainage tube isn't long enough, the connection tube doesn't fit my sink ( but that's fine my shower head disconnects) but other then that it's great. My Daughter has claimed it as hers. My husband doesn't understand why I purchased it but he will see over time. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Latisha Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I literally reviewed this for over 2 years and finally bought it and my family is so happy . It is lightweight. Do small loads at a time to make sure the clothes are clean and when you rinse, do it two times just to be sure that you get all the soap out. The spinner is fantastic. You’re clothes are about 95% slightly damp, so when you do hang them up to dry they are dry in minutes. I simply can’t say how pleased we are with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi M Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camper/rv full time living!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! We live in a camper with two adults three kids and a dog and this is a life saver! We were spending about $30 every other day at the laundry mat and now I only go if I need to wash blankets, heavy jackets, or my husbands work attire (he is pipeline). I highly recommend this!! I currently have it in our bedroom in the camper with the drain hose just hanging out the door and I’m filling it with water using the pot inside my instapot (haha!) all of our clothes come out smelling amazing and they will be dry in just a few hours after hang drying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short drain hose! Smh
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, I dont think the person who invented this thought about making the drain hose tab bit longer, or even sumthin to help push the water out instead of making it under 5 inches that doesn’t even raise up. I put the knob on drain. It literally soaked my whole floors, I tried raising it to the toilet it wouldn’t even reach! It’s literally made to be put in the shower anywhere else it isn’t gonna work! This will be returned ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Ho Tu

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and light!
customer_reviews.text: Gets clothes super clean! It’s a wash-rinse-softener-rinse again system, so one load takes a ton of time and patience- but! This little beauty had a ton of power, and stains that wouldn’t come out in my regular washer came out in one cycle! The hose that comes with it is fickle and won’t stay hooked to the washer without holding it- I fill up a bucket (or two) with water and a tiny bit of soap and fill the machine rather than fighting with the hose. You have to make sure the spin dryer is balanced or it sounds like the machine is going to fly through the roof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well.  Will update if this changes.  3/30/2020
customer_reviews.text: 03/30/2020 It works well. No problems yet. Will update when this changes. <<< SOCK LINT FILTER >>> 07/02/2020 It still works. It does send a lot of LINT down the drain. We tried to use mess filter to sort the lint out but it doesn't work as well as an old sock that I tied to the end of the drain hose. It's cheap and it works. Try it and thank me if you care.
customer_reviews.author: Corey P.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: We have lake cabin. I in no way want to pay to have w/d hookups installed. I had no faith in the machine... however prob one of the more brilliant purchases of my life. This thing spins out better than my $800 real washer. We do use a bucket to fill it up instead of the joke hose but for what it is its the best of its kind. Hands. Down.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved me many trips to the laundry mat ! It’s perfect for me and family, I live in an apartment with no washer dryer hook up. I have a 2 month old (who is constantly getting her little clothes dirty) and a 4 year old, which means this mommy is washing clothes on a daily basis. The clothes get washed very well and the spinner works fantastically. I can only do small loads at a time which is a bit time consuming but other than that it works great. I keep it in the tub while washing, makes the draining process so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Enyd torres

customer_reviews.title: Why is it shocking ME!?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and how quick it is to use especially when i have an emergency and need to wash something quick. The only thing i do not like is that it shocks me when im trying to take my clothes out of either washer or spinner side. I have tried emailing the seller with no response back as to why it is happening. I have tried different outlets of my home and still happens. Amazon could not return it because I had just passed the return policy time frame. So now im stuck with a washer machine that shocks me at all time. Hopefully something can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE THIS IS TOTAL JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions say to rinse before first use. So I did. The fill hose broke during the rinse before I could even use it once. What a piece of junk. It's being returned regardless of what the instructions say.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but my washer didnt work!
customer_reviews.text: Love how it washes better than my landlords washer, but the dryer part wont spin! Im so saddened by this! Im moving to a place that has no washer and dryer and i was so excited about this. Been trying to find one for 2 yrs and finally got someone to ship where i live and now the dryer wont spin! No its not too much clothes in there either. My towel and daughters socks and pjs. Hopefully they can send another one here. I really did like one. Giving 3 stars due to the dryer part not working.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Small and fast
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty cool. Quick use.. I have used it twice to make sure but Mine seems to get stuck on 2 when I go to spin dry which for me isn't too big of a deal like not worth returning over... But all In all yes it does work it in one load It could hold 4 regular shower towels and 2nd load was 3 shirts and two pants and underwear. The spin dry does do good I'd say about 60% dry but if you ring them out first 75%dry it Dries well for thinner material. I would still recommend it though.
customer_reviews.author: Doodles

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad. As a family living in a 3 bedroom apartment that shares a pair of washer and dryers with the whole building it gives me relief that I don't have to climb four flights of stairs to check and see if the washers are open/working. I suggest watching videos through product reviews and with YouTube to get an idea on how to use this washer. It's very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Icky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mini washer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mini washing machine because our full size washer broke down and we needed something until it was repaired. I cannot tell you how pleased I am with this mini washer. We have not missed a beat. Clothes are being washed we do not have a pile up of clothes. I have washed every article of adult sized clothing, body towels, and even the covers for the dog beds. Of course my wash loads are smaller, but it is better than going to a laundromat.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: With the understanding of not being fully automatic this works wonderfully. I have mine on a wide side of ...
customer_reviews.text: This gizmo is saving me, my sanity and MONEY. With the understanding of not being fully automatic this works wonderfully. I have mine on a wide side of the bathtub so it is close to water, no worries with draining and is out of the way eliminating the need of moving it. You will find your own tips for such things like amount and types of clothing to be washed at the time (sleeves/pant legs become entangled), cleaning the tub frequently, washing out the spinner helps with blockage accumulating along with some forceful water through the tub drain. I am more than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: denhamspringsla

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Company
customer_reviews.text: I am totally pleased with the company and the product not many people ship to Alaska they shipped it reach to your undamaged and before expected date the product is great and the company is totally amazing for shipping to Alaska thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tyann

customer_reviews.title: It’s good enough
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this washing machine for a year and it works fine. However it does go offline sometimes. The spinning side sometimes doesn’t work but it will start working again after some shakes, lol. As a portable light duty machine, I’m probably beating it. For the price tho, it’s quality is fine. Don’t know how long it’s going to last for me, but I won’t expect it to be super durable anyways. It’s has been handy, I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for an RV!!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for weeks for the proper washing machine for my travel trailer. THIS is it. It’s SO light, SO easy to hook up and works very well. For me it has gotten my clothes rinsed very well leaving them easy to hang dry. I’m in love with this little machine.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo Viani

customer_reviews.title: The spin cycle stopped only 4 months after buying. water adapter is far to small.
customer_reviews.text: Now in the 4th month of owning the machine it stops spining cycle all at once leaving us with wet clothes and needing them to line dry for work in the morning. Great. Another draw back is the fill tube. If is to small to really attach to any of your normal household , faucets. The company include a larger. Chapter, it would allow you to attach it to a larger faucet, the one that they give you is much too small. I hear, listen to many of the videos and written reviews on the item.
customer_reviews.author: Blueyed-GrtNana

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for a small size apartment
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of washing. The dryer is really inconvenient because you can’t put that many clothes in there to dry and you have to keep restarting timer every 5 mins. But it does dry and the washer cleans very well. Not recommended if you have large loads. But the best of all is if you have a small child that wears bibs and changes clothes a lot throughout the day or your children wears uniforms then comes home to change, this is perfect for that. Good for college kids or if you have a preteen that you’re training to be independent this is also perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Washer
customer_reviews.text: Love this Washer and Spinner. The clothes get extra clean. It is close to as clean as they get in a normal washer, if not cleaner. The Spinner gets the clothes almost dry, I just have to hang them up for a bit to make sure they are fully dried. It is easier with our set up to dump water into the washing tub, rather than hook up the hoses. It's nice for when my toddler has an accident in the night, and we need to do a quick wash of the bedding. Being in an apartment without a washer and dryer hookup this product has been very helpful. My toddler loves helping with the laundry!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not really an automatic washing machine
customer_reviews.text: It is small/compact and light, but when you read the instructions, you find out that you have to do everything except agitate/spin the thing manually. Fill it, put in soap, agitate, put in clothes, agitate, move to other side, fill, spin, move to other side, fill spin, move to other side, spin... too much work, might as well wash it by hand if I have to go back 8 times to run one cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware to check EVERYTHING included with a product like this to avoid unnecessary ‘out of pocket’ expenses
customer_reviews.text: Washer appears to look better than the bismi one I bought last year that lasted only 20 wash loads before it quit working but, at least it had a long enough drainage hose to allow drainage from unit into sink; unlike this TG23 which only had a 2 foot drainage hose forcing me to place washer unit onto adjacent kitchen counter to sink, in order to use it until ordering ‘express’ a 6 foot extension hose that should have been with unit upon purchase now costing an additional $9.99 in order to ‘properly’ use unit on the kitchen floor, not kitchen counter top as it is just now🤨
customer_reviews.author: Barry D Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Omg, life changing, the best
customer_reviews.text: Omg i freakin love this thing!! No more sharing an apartment washer! My clothes actually get clean now! Couldn't stress this enough if you use a community washer GET THIS!! You wont know how little landlord's and laundry mats actually clean the building washers until you use this. Uses around 8 gallons with a full load if anyone wondered.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: 😃Good for your dollar. Idk about your time😐
customer_reviews.text: Works great. What I don’t like is the inconvenience of having to switch and refill. Okay I’ll explain. You fill the washer other water soap and clothes, wash, drain put wet clothes in spin dryer fill with water spin drain, switch back to washer fill with water wash, drain squeeze excess water from clothes transfer to spin cycle don’t add water then your done😵one great thing is that the spin cycle works ver y well at getting that water out of your clothes.🙃 all around great quality. Efficient gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Twilight

customer_reviews.title: Good small machine as long as you can figure out how to drain the water without spilling it
customer_reviews.text: Good small washing machine. I put it in the bathtub when I do laundry so that I can easily let the water drain without spilling it everywhere. Ideally you should put the machine on some kind of stand on wheels that's high enough for the water to drain into something, since it only gravity drains. Otherwise it's not bad washes the laundry ok better then hand washing.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Edited: I had to send it back. It stopped draining properly, and the hose was just too flimsy to properly fill the washer without kinking. Also, there was no real way to properly connect the fill hose to the faucet without it constantly slipping off. Absolutely love. Easy, efficient. Cleans really well, and spins dry unbelievably well. Only way it could improve would be to have a better faucet fitting, higher quality hose, and a lint trap. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: ThoughtfulReader

customer_reviews.title: ... in 67 washing machine at one time now my dirty clothes is up to par I go around trying ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the washer Machine set up on my bath tub I am handicapped and I only have one lake are used to do my wash in 67 washing machine at one time now my dirty clothes is up to par I go around trying to find things to wash that’s a much I love this machine best thing I ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must buy if you have that skin sensitivity that needed extra effort to clean clothes and not sharing the machine to everybody.
customer_reviews.text: This portable washing machine is small enough to fit in our bathroom sink I placed it in there not so tall for my height (5’0”) to fill in the water. Yes, fair enough load capacity very soap efficient. The drainer works great and dry almost 90% of water mine I use the apt dryer ( for everybody) to completely dry my laundry. So far it’s really good. One thin I don’t like is the hose that is included it’s completely of no use although didn’t affect the machine itself. I complained about this and they gave me options fair enough to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little washer for small living!
customer_reviews.text: This little washer served us well on a recent RV trip. We kept it in the shower when no one was showering.The wash tub held a bit more clothing than I would have assumed and though the spin basket only holds about half that much, it didn't turn out to be a downer because spinning can be completed in about two minutes! Clothes were clean and fresh and mostly dry - really! The only downside is the lack of dryer, but not the product's fault! Great washer for our RV and our future boat!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia RD

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love to his product I have no complains this is freaking amazing.
customer_reviews.author: daysha hill

customer_reviews.title: Good bye laundry forever.....
customer_reviews.text: I got my machine only 2hours ago, and I already got a load done. I washed 1thin beach wrap, 2long sleeve shirts (med), 5t shirts ,1cotton dress 2 polyester dresses. Washed great ,rinsed great ,spinner like a champ...spin took 2 loads. I am surprised how much water was extracted in such little time. Takes up very little space. I used it in a half bath sized room. My 2 grandkids loved helping me. And will be learning how to wash their own. The product was delivered on time. I would recommend and purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda M

customer_reviews.title: Really small loads only. Great spin cycle
customer_reviews.text: This is a machine for the single person. Takes a load of about 5 shirts or 3 towels Max. The skin cycle is great that most times I can just hand dry the clothes after. I'm not happy with the supplied hoses, and the power cable is not long enough and probably would need to have an GFCI. You do need to elevate the machine if you'd like to completely drain it. All in all this would be perfect for a small dorm room or cabin.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Saves you detergent and money from going to the laundromat.
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has worked great. I live in a small apartment and use this machine in my walk in shower and I have not had any problems. The spin dryer part is a little tricky when it comes to figuring out the load size but it removes all the excess water. You will need to hang your clothes to dry them completely. I'm still getting used to it but so far I dont have any complaints. It only takes a little detergent and softener and if you put dryer sheets in the spinner it will make your clothes smell extra good.
customer_reviews.author: GiA

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this washing machine! It has exceeded my expectations. I'm currently living on a military base in the middle of nowhere and there is only 1 laundromat within 75 miles. I hate going to the laundromat so I bought this washer with the intention to wash a small load daily and just hang dry everything. The spin cycle leaves clothes almost completely dry, and they are fully dry within 2 hours of hanging. The only thing I don't like is how much lint is left behind but I bought some lint rollers from the dollar store so it's no big deal. All in all, I'm so happy with this washer!
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Luna

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I was a tad skeptical about this thing but I can honestly say it is so amazing. I got this to use in my apartment and it couldn’t be more convenient. I personally did not have to buy any additional supplies to improve the usage. I place it on my bathroom counter, plug the tube to fill it right into my faucet and drain it into the sink. The directions tell you everything you need to know. It surprisingly can wash quite a bit in each load. Only minor thing is that the actual power cord is a bit short. Other than that, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Washer
customer_reviews.text: I would have fgiven 5 stars but there were no instructions to tell me how to assemble or use. I had to go on youtube to see how. But other then that it does what its suppose to wash, and the spin get the majority of the water out, you will still need to drry them or hang dry. Im disabled so this is just comveince for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome machine
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little machine!! I was so excited to use it because I’ve been going to local laundry mats for years and my clothes are never as clean as I would like them and the dryers are not good either. This was an excellent purchase and it really delivers!! Clean fresh clothing and the dry spin side gets all of the water out! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Artesha

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic little guy .
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was nervous purchasing this little guy . How ever it really get my clothes clean ! I’ve been going to the laundry mat for 6 years and decided to bite the bullet and purchase this guy . I’m glad I did ! The spinner it’s self is fantastic .Its not perfect nothing is but it was worth the money and is saving me money because I don’t have to take my stuff somewhere else to do laundry . My only advice is if you are washing a heavy towel wash it by itself and do not over pour you detergent .. it takes forever to rinse if you don.
customer_reviews.author: BHoff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my travel trailer and love it! It fits next to my shower where it can easily be filled with water and drained. My clothes come out clean and the spin ner gets them almost dry. I have even washed a set of queen sheets! So glad I watched the videos and read the reviews. This little washer will save me time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: With the right location and modified directions, the use of this machine is user-friendly.
customer_reviews.text: It took me awhile to find the right location for this machine, while in use. Pouring water in was too cumbersome and the inlet hose is not usable (too cheaply made). So on the toilet, using my shower head that can extend, was the best location for ease of usage. Following the directions takes too much draining and repeat. I don’t think the written directions are user friendly- too many steps.So I just use the spinner to rinse off suds once in the spinner before new rinse water in the main tank. Clothes look great and do dry faster than normal hand washing allows. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Critter

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: As an offgridder, this thing is the bomb. And for just a few hand-washed items just having the spinner is a Godsend. I have the water fill on Alexa to fill by voice command full or half load. Music plays when full. The spinner does such a good job that even here at avg, 80% RH the stuff dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Greg West

customer_reviews.title: Product worth it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my parent's! They absolutely loved this and easily fit in their home bathroom and conversion van bathroom! This is perfect and they washed 5 loads same day as purchase and runs 100% smoothly! And easy to set up and lift! The extender I bought of Amazon did not fit however they had to use ductape
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little washer
customer_reviews.text: I stay in a small 1 bedroom apartment, and this washer is absolutely perfect for me - it handles more than I thought it would, and is extremely light and easy to store. My only problem with it is that the gravity drain tube can fall off rather easily, and can make a mess if you don't drain it completely, but so far it's only happened twice & that's easy to avoid. The best compact washer I've used so far
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Money saver! Time saver! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Washer is excellent! I sit on top of my kitchen counter and use my hose to fill. The dryer get all the water out but it does take 30 minutes for clothes to hang dry
customer_reviews.author: @charmgurl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The washer part works fine, easy to use. However, the hose supplied is worthless because it does not fit a normal sink tap. The spin is absolutely worthless, it cannot handle more than a couple wash cloths without getting off-centered. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Its cute but its not what i expected. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Its cute but its not what i expected. The wash and spin drums are two different sizes. The hoses for the water supply dont fit on any of the water sources in my home. Sometime I have to put just one item in the spin drum after taking it out of the wash tub or it will shake uncontrollably. I have to use it in the bathroom to let the shower run into the wash tub and allow the water to drain. But I guess the light weight of the appliance and its portability is a plus. Also my clothes do come out clean and practically dry.
customer_reviews.author: Pheenyx

customer_reviews.title: Faulty dryer (5 min cycle?)
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed by this washer/dryer. The wash load is very small, which is fine. It washes everything very well. Be required a lot of work to get if clean. The dryer is where I had problems. With a dry cycle of only 5 minutes its very hard to get yiur clothes dryed. I was however able to rig the timmer so that it would go ubtil my clothes where completely dry. Which never actually happened. Hoping get a refund. Please stear clear from this one guys. :(
customer_reviews.author: chris_chin96

customer_reviews.title: Stink clothes No more!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo happy to have this. Took 3 weeks to get here but it works simply and beautifully. Ordered a longer drain and clamps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save money
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product of its kind on the market. Where I live they doubled the cost of washing and drying and I was determined not to spend another dime using their machines. Its faster and way cheaper your clothes get clean the the spin cycle is a hurricane so really dry to the touch I just hang them up and its all good. Best news is in 5 months it will pay for itself!! Drains well and no mess or water on the floor. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: ronbo

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I knew this was a return and after a few loads I figured out why BUT... the machine was fine! I started looking to see why spin wasn’t working correctly and with the help of a wire coat hanger I pulled five women’s ankle socks and two pair of panties out from around the basket. Previous customer should probably have used the little plastic piece on top of load to spin out as per instructions to keep load in basket. I’m very happy with this little machine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: It appeared to clean the clothes decently for its size, however spinning to drain the water was a no go. Could only do certain items one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly fairley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about these types of small laundry units, but after speaking with someone who owns one, I said I might as well give it a try and it works great for me. I live in my own apartment and this machine suits me and my budget quite well. No more driving out to the busy public laundrymats on hot summer days or the cold winter. It's not your top of the line laundry unit but it gets the job done and that works for me. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: J Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Be Very Cautious
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I’m just going to go straight to the point: The spin cycle function broke after use on the second day. Not one year, not eight months, *two days.* The ideology of it was all there — no need to take anymore trips to the laundromat, save a lot of money, make life slightly more bearable. Right? Unfortunately not for this product. Don’t let the low price fool you, I’d steer clear from this one and head towards a different direction.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Elzey

customer_reviews.title: Saves money but hang drying is annoying
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a powerful little machine. I was skeptical at first. But boy was I wrong! Anytime I come home the washer and dryer are always being used by neighbors and I DO NOT do public laundro mats. I wash at whatever time I want. Minimal noise. Would recommended if you go through clothes as much as me
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Just get it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Perfect for a single person. The machine itself deserves five stars however I wish the new cord to plug in the machine was longer.... also the water inlet hose did not fit my faucet. However filling up a bucket of water is faster... love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Love that spin dryer!!!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a few scratches and the water input tubes were kind of dirty, but this thing is making my life so much easier. I don't have to haul my clothes to the laundromat anymore, and it's small enough to fit in my tiny room! The instruction manual it came with was a little confusing but I watched a few videos about it on YouTube and it's actually very simple to use. The little spin dryer works way better than I thought it would. Just make sure you fill it to the top or the whole machine will rattle when you turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshino

customer_reviews.title: Spin Side Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: The spin side stopped working right after six months. So now I can go back to the laundromat or wring everything by hand. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Manetta Du

customer_reviews.title: Best portable washer
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can say that I dislike is the hose doesn’t come with varied sized adapters. This one doesn’t fit any of my sinks. But other than that I love my washer. I live in an RV so this washer is a must. I use the shower head to fill it. No problem at all!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly W.

customer_reviews.title: Value for money spent
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this machine for the past 1 week and absolutely love it. Though too early to completely judge the product, I still think it's worth the money spent. One complain, if any, is that the inlet hoses are too flimsy. Though in all fairness one cannot expect top of the line hose for the money spent. If they specify the inlet pipe dimensions explicitly, would be easier to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Vasudevan V.

customer_reviews.title: Good little machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this powerful little machine. It does a great job. I just wish the spin side was the same as the wash side. You have to scale beck some on the load that you put into the spin side or it will shake very wildly. I found out that if I place the garments along the wall of the spin tub, it does not shake and does a really good job at getting out access water.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Gravity drain.
customer_reviews.text: Was not what I expected. Didn't get the soap out completely from my closes during rinse, I would have to rinse my clothes 3 times to get a tablespoon of soap out. Once filled with water, you could barely move the thing and I had to lift it to the counter to get it to drain, I was unable to lift it one day and accidentally dropped it. Obviously water went everywhere and it crashed to the floor so it broke. Now I'm out close to $200 and a washing machine. It just wasn't what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kamala

customer_reviews.title: cleans clothes excellent
customer_reviews.text: Spin cycle is half the size, works great if clothes aren’t balanced just right it can be noisy if you are trying to be incognito. I prefer to place it on a cooler or sturdy box and put it next to shower and fill the water with the hand held shower and then you can use warm water and not have it in the way at your sink. I love it better than the apartment washer. My clothes are cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: I have a house and this little machine works better than a house size washer and dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a dream come true for anyone who has a small place. I have a house and this little machine works better than a house size washer and dryer. And it even helps to lower the cost of your electric bill. I love this machine. I have a regular size washer to but this one makes me wish I alway's had this one first. I would recommend it to everyone in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Kareem Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great for backup
customer_reviews.text: This is great for emergencies when our usual washing and drying machines weren't working at the time. But it gives off a weird burning smell after awhile, which drew the concern of my parents. I'm not sure why that is? But again, it was great as a backup, and I'm most certainly taking it with me when I do move away.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Wong Si-Lin

customer_reviews.title: The spinner is not durable,got damaged the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: I received this portable washer in July but have not been chance to buy a stool to place it on .I finally got a table last night ,placed the machine on it ,did the laundry and the spinner broke down by the end of the wash.This is the very first time I used this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mono V.Dukuly

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & Highly Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Arrived extremely fast and delivered everything I was hoping for. My main reason for purchasing this device was to be able to reuse laundry water in my garden bed. I’m also pleased with how quick this machine washes clothes and the spinner works really well to spin off extr water in the clothes. All my clothes have easily dried out by the end of the day when hung up to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Schaaf

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little guy.. I do not have well or septic and it is a good agitator.. Do not overload.. No big blankets.. You will see once you get used to use it.. Pretty amazing little guy actually... Not suitable for a large family unless you have time and patience for all day washing... Go easy on the bleach soak the night before and balance your load.... I know you will be happy
customer_reviews.author: ozzie

customer_reviews.title: Spin Dryer Burnt
customer_reviews.text: The size of this portable washer and spin dryer is perfect for a dorm, small apartment or condo. The washer feature is great and I absolutely loved it. However, the spin dryer, after a minute of spinning, it started smelling like a burnt electric and then shuts off completely. Would be nice to have the error corrected and launch an improved and better version of this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Cay Cay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful that this was not going to be too much work. I was so wrong. it is easy to use, I put mine on casters so I could roll it easily in my bathroom. I choose to fill it manually with my shower sprayer. I have a walk in shower so the hose drains perfect without having to have a table to raise it about whatever you are draining it with. The cord is slightly short, so I had to add an extension cord. It really does hold allot of close, dont use much detergent and to spin dry you do in smaller loads. Fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny L.

customer_reviews.title: Watch the spin cycle
customer_reviews.text: The spin action is very helpful, as it gets most of the water out of the clothes. But you have to make sure the clothes are distributed the right way in the basket or it gets very loud!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nyffeler

customer_reviews.title: Best portable unit
customer_reviews.text: Wow this little unit washes clothes better then any washing machine I've ever had. The spinner will leave your clothes almost to dry does shortening your dry time if you are using a compact dryer. My average load drai's in about 20-25 minutes. If I spend things like t-shirts they will hang dry in about an hour. I did have a slight problem with the drain and the company immediately shipped me a whole new unit.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Y.

customer_reviews.title: It does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, it washes and spin dries wonderfully. My complaints are the fact it's very flimsy. Also, the hoses give out literally after about 10 washes because the rubber scoops at the end don't shrink back. Without the hoses you need to use buckets of water and that kills your back. Replacement hoses are VERY hard to find because of the different ends needed to attach to the washer/dryer and hook onto a faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Works good but is leaking
customer_reviews.text: Literally just got mine today and it's leaking from the bottom. It washes pretty good tho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Our machine came with a crack in it and stopped spinning within TWO WEEKS. VERY DISAPPOINTED. Amazon cannot replace it no more in stock. Returning it has been hell with UPS not picking up. A Very Frustrating experience.
customer_reviews.author: Beemee

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I are full timers in our travel trailer. I bought this to wash my husbands work uniforms & my sons ball uniforms every night. It has exceeded my expectations. I can only wash about 1/4 of a “regular” load at a time, but I really don’t mind. The water hose attachment (once I hooked it up) was a game changer. Drainage depends on gravity, so the machine must be a little higher up. I sit mine on a coke crate in the shower and have no issues. Would definitely recommend for tight spaces, dorms, small apartments or rv’s.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Shutt

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Let it be known, I never write reviews. In fact this is my first ever review on anything. I loved my product, it cleans the clothes well, dries them to 99% dry, and it incredibly convenient. However, it's the customer service for this product that earns it a 5 from me. My spin dryer suddenly stopped working after only 3 months suddenly, when I emailed the company they immediately responded offering me a new product with no hassle at all. Even telling me I can keep the old product for spare parts (as an Electrical Engineering student this is beyond exciting) Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Alyssa White

customer_reviews.title: Bought A hassle
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to make life easier by avoiding the laundry mat.. thought this bad boy was the trick.. boy was I wrong.. my clothes end up coming out really stiff and linty an like I left them in the washer for too long an let them air dry in a bundle, clothes have awful texture when all is said and done. I am returning.. I’d rather deal with the hassle of the mat and actually have my clothes feel clean when I’m done. Did I mention it took well over an hour for one small load of wash cloths because of the process of repetitively switching back and forth between washer and spinner..
customer_reviews.author: Sydni Healy

customer_reviews.title: Very good washer
customer_reviews.text: I am able to hook it up to the shower head and wash my baby's clothes weekly. I am happy with the results and dries 75 percent of the clothes so I'll just hang it up and it is dry fast. The size is small and doesn't take up space. It washes about 1 load of baby clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Garcia
